name: Sixty Second Shump
description:
Created for the One Minute Game Jam #5, defeat waves of enemy ships and try to survive to the end of the game!

Controls
  • On PC: Arrow keys or 'A' and 'D' to move left and right, SPACE to fire
  • On mobile: Touchscreen controls provided
Troubleshooting

If you find any problems, please raise an issue on the GitHub repo for this project:
https://github.com/jazibobs/sixty-second-shump/issues

Privacy

For Google Play - No personal or identifiable information is collect by this app.
